# This robots.txt file controls crawling of URLs under https://morphling.xyz.
# All crawlers are disallowed to crawl files in the "includes" directory, such
# as .css, .js, but Google needs them for rendering, so Googlebot is allowed
# to crawl them.
User-agent: *
Disallow: /includes/

# allow Googlebot to crawl files generated by astro.js or hosted at /public/, sitemal.xml
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

Sitemap: https://morphling.xyz/sitemap.xml

// Allow screaming spider seo to crawl the site
User-agent: Screaming Frog SEO Spider
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

User-agent: spiderbot
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 
// Allow bingbot to crawl the site
User-agent: bingbot
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow applebot to crawl the site
User-agent: applebot
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow facebookexternalhit to crawl the site
User-agent: facebookexternalhit
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Twitterbot to crawl the site
User-agent: Twitterbot
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot to crawl the site
User-agent: AdsBot-Google
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot Mobile to crawl the site
User-agent: AdsBot-Google-Mobile
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot Image to crawl the site
User-agent: AdsBot-Google-Mobile-Apps
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot Video to crawl the site
User-agent: AdsBot-Google-Video
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot Shopping to crawl the site
User-agent: AdsBot-Google-Shopping
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot AdSense to crawl the site
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot AdSense Mobile to crawl the site
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google-Mobile
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot AdSense Image to crawl the site
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google-Image
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot AdSense Video to crawl the site
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google-Video
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot AdSense Shopping to crawl the site
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google-Shopping
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot AdSense Mobile to crawl the site
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google-Mobile-Apps
Allow: /includes/, /public/ 

// Allow Google AdsBot AdSense Mobile to crawl the site
User-agent: Mediapartners-Google-Apps
Allow: /includes/, /public
